description.brief: As an exchange student, I have been fortunate to serve as a Teaching Assistant. My role involves actively participating in the university's official program known as the Global Lounge. This program facilitates weekly meetings where Korean and international students can come together, explore various themes, and engage in different activities. Working alongside fellow Indonesian, Japanese, and Korean students, we collaboratively organize and manage this program on a weekly basis, fostering a vibrant and inclusive campus environment.
I had the opportunity to serve as a trainer for HIMTI's PBP Techno programming class, where I engaged with over 40 freshmen in an online setting.
detail: Entry-Level Programming in C Language
Over 40 attendees

description.brief: After undergoing a thorough selection process that spanned half of a semester (3 mos), I was fortunate to be chosen as one of the two selected assistants for the Laboratory Center in Bandung. This opportunity granted me an official part-time role as an assistant, where I had the privilege to provide support in the teaching process within the Computer Science Department's laboratory.
detail: Course: Interaction Design (COMP6667032)
Course: Algorithm & Programming (COMP6667032)
Completed 55+ Competitive Programming cases
Provided assistance to 240 students

description.brief: BNCC is a highly esteemed organization within the Binus University. As activists, we organized a diverse range of special events and monthly gatherings covering various technology-related topics.
detail: Member of the Learning and Training (LnT) team
Active involvement in organizational activities for 2 semesters during university
Served as Chief Committee for LnT Camp 2022
Contributed as event staff for various events, including Techbinar

description.brief: As a SahabatCita volunteer, I had the privilege of utilizing my time and skills as an editor and graphic designer to support engagement initiatives.
detail: Participated in three significant projects
Edited a promotional video for Festival Mahasiswa Baru & Pelajar Indonesia 2021
Edited opening videos and in-event footage for Festival Mahasiswa Baru & Pelajar Indonesia 2021
Collaborated with campus organizations to promote SejutaCita and establish partnerships
Created captivating Instagram stories for marketing purposes

association.name: OSIS Ekklesia SMAK 1 BPK Penabur Bandung

description.brief: After my previous position as a staff member, I ran for the position of Student Council President. As a result, I was elected with over 600 votes out of the 900+ students of SMAK 1 BPK Penabur Bandung. I served as the president for a full year, followed by a transition period to the new student council.
detail: Responsible for overseeing a team of 40 student council members
Directly managed the 1st, 4th, 7th, and 8th divisions
Successfully organized the Sport Class Meeting at SARAGA ITB Bandung
Successfully held the Mini Pensi event "Elysian in Wonderland" featuring a well-known Indonesian singer Sheryl Sheinafia
Released 3 new programs: A.R.M.Y, E-Fokus, and E-Yearbook
Sucesfully managed school expo involving Gita Gutawa as the guest star

association.name: OSIS Ekklesia SMAK 1 BPK Penabur Bandung

description.brief: In my first year of high school, I was selected to be a member of the student council, which proved to be a transformative experience for me. It provided an invaluable opportunity to discover my passions and delve into the world of technology and computers. As a staff member in the Language and Culture division (8th division), alongside two other dedicated individuals, we focused on news coverage, publication, as well as graphic and video editing for various events throughout the year.
detail: Interviewed Isyana Sarasvati at School's Festival "Psithurism"
Successfully published three editions of FOKUS magazine
Edited after-event videos for School's Expo
Being a committe of several events involving Indonesian national singer such as Rendy Pandugo and The Overtunes
